content: “The Bingham Canyon Mine, the largest open pit (copper) mine in the United States, will generate water pollution in perpetuity from the mine’s waste rock piles. Mine operations have resulted in a plume of contaminated groundwater extending over 70 square miles…”—Earthworks__no.0446, 2020. #coppermining #coppermines #openpitmining #groundwatercontamination #toxicminerals #waterpollution #Utah
